bibl.title: Greek Astronomical Tables in the Papyrus Carlsberg Collection (with Associated Fragments from Other Collections).
Archiv für Papyrusforschung und verwandte Gebiete

bibl.note: Includes an introduction on the Greek and Demotic astronomical papyri from the Papyrus Carlsberg Collection, their provenance and relation to the Tebtynis temple library. - I. P. Carlsberg 104. Perpetual almanac for Jupiter. Tebtynis temple library, second half of the first century. - II. P. Carlsberg 141. Template for Venus. Tebtynis?, first century. - III. P. Carlsberg 239. Table of lunar mean longitudes. Provenance unknown, second century. - P. Carlsberg 673 + P. Berol. Inv. 14401 + P.S.I. Inv. Demotico 19/5 + 94. Monthly almanac. Tebtynis temple library, 54-55? - 65-66 A.D. - Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.seg: 141.4 P. Berol. Inv. 14401 + P. Carlsberg 673 + P.S.I. Inv. Demotico 19/5 + 94 P. Carlsberg 104; 141; 239
Alexander Jones & Marco Perale, Greek Astronomical Tables in the Papyrus Carlsberg Collection (with Associated Fragments from Other Collections).
ArchPF 58 (2012) pp. 308-343 et pll. coul. XV-XXa.

Includes an introduction on the Greek and Demotic astronomical papyri from the Papyrus Carlsberg Collection, their provenance and relation to the Tebtynis temple library. - I. P. Carlsberg 104. Perpetual almanac for Jupiter. Tebtynis temple library, second half of the first century. - II. P. Carlsberg 141. Template for Venus. Tebtynis?, first century. - III. P. Carlsberg 239. Table of lunar mean longitudes. Provenance unknown, second century. - P. Carlsberg 673 + P. Berol. Inv. 14401 + P.S.I. Inv. Demotico 19/5 + 94. Monthly almanac. Tebtynis temple library, 54-55? - 65-66 A.D. - Avec résumé en anglais.
